item.description:
December 1, 2009 - DEN (Deals Exchange Network)


Deals Exchange Network



WHEN: 1st Tuesday of Every Month 6:30 PM - Enjoy Networking, Deals, Prizes and Fun!!!

WHERE: Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA

WHAT: Nick Aalerud will share 6 tips for Finding and Analyzing Deals

PLUS - Networking, Deals Exchange, and Deal or No Deal


BE THE EXPERT at Boston AREIA's Deals Exchange Network!
Sit on our volunteer panel and walk through the process of analyzing deals presented from our audience. Learn techniques and questions that experts ask to make a first glance decision in less than 15 minutes. Contact us to volunteer.

Already an expert? Want to sit on the panel of experts? Contact us today.

Have a deal that you would love for someone to help you analyze? Contact us today.


Nick Aalerud: 6 Tips to Finding and Analyzing Deals

You'll learn:

Nick's 3 favorite ways to find motivated sellers
How to train your bird dogs the easy way...
Working with Asset Managers and REO Departments
How to get accurate comparables
Using an income filter - "How much WILL that property actually cash flow?"
Nick's very own rehab cheat sheet!

This meeting is good for 1/2 hour Marketing and 1/2 hour Purchasing credit for our PHP program.

***SAVE THE DATE - BRING YOUR DEALS - BRING LOTS OF BUSINESS CARDS AND COME PREPARED TO NETWORK!***



D.E.N. Meeting
6:30 PM - Meeting
Location: Doubletree Guest Suites, 400 Soldier's Field Road, Boston
Free to members, Visitors and meetup members only $25 at the door.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: December D.E.N. - Deals, Exchange Network
